income_messages:
From: i**************a@yahoo.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 22:04:14
SUBJECT:   Dear Friend,
  Dear Friend,
I know that this may come as a surprise to you, please do not treat this as an unsolicited email as I made much research before contacting you, I understand and believe that you are someone with the capacity to handle this and have decided to contact you in this personal
confidential Issue.
I must express my proposal without reservation and I wish to tell you that I have contacted you because of a business of 500kgs of Gold / precious metal, 22+ Carats purity, presently
deposited in my company's vault.
I want you to try and understand me and also place yourself in my position as a vault manager of a safe keeping company, a lot have happened and I am aware of a whole lot of issue and having put up years with this company, I have nothing to write home about. Hence I have missed many opportunity and do not wish to see more go by.
I have contacted you because you can help me to achieve this as a foreigner, knowing that in today Gold world market, 500kg of Gold / precious metal is not a small money, I just need to know if I can trust that whole amount of Gold /precious metals in your care to sell them and we share the amount realized from the sales.
The depositor of the Gold bullion in question died three years ago and my company is not aware of his death, he is a foreigner and as a foreigner I believe that you and I can handle this perfectly well, I happen to have some of his documents with me, I am requesting that you stand as his partner or relative, so that we can process the release to you, this will only be known by both of us only, as you need to maintain absolute secret about it.
I am assuring you of 100% success and you will be needed to come down and visit the security company and inspect the processing of the transaction, but if your duty could not permit you, I can get an attorney to represent you in any dealings with the company, as an insider I will inform you
on all to do to get this transaction done and I will also stand to attest that you are his relative since I am the oldest serving staff in the company.
I want you to read this thoroughly and get back to me, I am very ready to release the certificate of Deposit to you as we proceed forward, I will implore you to have this deal accomplish with me and we need an urgent move to secure this transaction.
I will wait to hear from you, please kindly write me back
urgently.
Sincerely,
Mr.Bright Sama.   
From: i**************a@yahoo.com
To: ea53618@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 15:14:03
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Friend,
Dear Sir,
It doesn't take any much time to get your benefits 
Your job is only to find a Buyer with the capacity to liquidate the entire Gold.  Once the Gold is sold off your commission will be paid directly into your nominated account as my direct mandate.
We shall discuss your commission and procedures when you confirms your capacity to get it done 
I look forward to hearing from you
Best Regards 
Bright
outbound_messages:
From: ea53618@m**************m
To: i**************a@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-03-14 22:04:15
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Friend,
That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
From: ea53618@m**************m
To: i**************a@yahoo.com
Time: 2023-03-15 16:04:14
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear Friend,
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Dear Friend,

conversations.body: That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
